headline: Citi Updates GlobalFoundries (GFS) Valuation Model to 2027 Estimates From 2026
summary: GlobalFoundries Inc. (NASDAQ:GFS) is one of the new stocks on the rise. On January 15, following a transfer of coverage, Citi raised its price target on GlobalFoundries to $42 from $35 with a Neutral rating on the shares. As part of this update, the firm rolled forward its valuation model to 2027 estimates, shifting from […]
